title: Bobby Bones Show Christmas Gift Exchange + Bobby Sends Message To Amy’s Son About His Head Lice
itunes:title: Bobby Bones Show Christmas Gift Exchange + Bobby Sends Message To Amy’s Son About His Head Lice
description:
The show gift exchange goes down. This year’s theme is to gift something you already own. Also, Bobby talks about a message he sent Amy’s son about his head lice situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
